    Animesh won the best poster award at IMECE 2022!

    By bd24583
    Posted on November 7, 2022

    Congratulations Animesh for winning the BEST poster award in Computing in Applied Mechanics! (IMECE2022)

    Huge congratulations to my graduate student @AnimeshRastog20 from @ut_caee for winning the BEST poster award in Computing in Applied Mechanics at IMECE 2022! @ut_caee @UTAustin @OdenInstitute @ASMEdotorg @MembraneLab #IMECE2022 pic.twitter.com/8djW1Mn9rd

    – Berkin Dortdivanlioglu (@brkn4) November 2, 2022
